attributes.action: give members of our armed forces a welcome home parade when they return from operational tours. So that we, the members of the British public can show them the respect that they deserve for serving our country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see organised parades for our boys and girls serving in the forces, when they return from serving our interests on operations abroad

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
